title: Pullman Company Town - Evidence for Historian

content.question: The historical situation described in the excerpt could best be used by historians to study which of the following?

choices.label: The impact of westward expansion on agricultural laborers during the Gilded Age
The ways in which standards of living changed during the late nineteenth century
The migration of African Americans out of the South during the early twentieth century
The attempts to reduce the use of child labor by activists during the Progressive Era

content.answer: The ways in which standards of living changed during the late nineteenth century
